data.actual_result: The emoji category bar is partially covered by the home indicator and screen corners making it hard to select some of the categories
data.expected_result: The emoji category bar should be padded to float above the home indicator area like other parts of the app
data.short_description: Emoji category bar gets obstructed by the iPhone X home indicator
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap and hold on any message - Tap Add Reaction - Tap Search to dismiss the keyboard
